text: (Kumbuchilani) lyuŵa lya tachinsonganganya pa Lisiku Lyansongano, lyele ni Lisiku lya kalamusyana (ŵandu ŵa ku Mbepo chakakalamusye ŵa ku Moto majumba gao gaakajile kwinjila akakulupilile). Sano jwachankulupilile Allah ni kutendaga yambone tansiimaachisye ilemwa yakwe, soni takan'jinjisye ku Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo, chakaŵe ŵandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Kwele ni kupunda kwekulungwa nnope
